DOC.criteria: Age 18 70 year old ; Skin type : I ( light caucasian ) III ( light brown ) ; Intact skin product apply ; Agreement comply test procedure attend clinic day fix time medical assessment application read dressing Signature inform consent form Pregnancy lactation Use antiinflammatory immunosuppressive 30 day three month prior selection ; Diseases cause immune suppression ; Use photosensitize drug ; History photodermatoses activity ; Personal family history photoinduced skin cancer ; Presence precursor lesion skin cancer , melanocytic nevus actinic keratoses ; Intense sun exposure experiment area Use new drug and/or cosmetic experiment ; Previous participation study product test ; Relevant medical history current evidence alcohol drug abuse ; Known historical suspect intolerance ingredient product study ( product test comparator ) ; Sponsor 's employee involve study , close family member employee involve study ;
